subject: Thanks for your refinance loan request, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
 
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
 
$385,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this user-friendly form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://ceizvqryvedfilles.com/
